EmailTemplate.name: Nissan Booking Cancellation Email To Client
EmailTemplate.subject: Nissan Fleet Evaluation booking cancellation request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Having trouble reading this email? View the online version.
Dear {!Evaluation_Booking__c.Contact_First_Name__c},
Thank you, your booking cancellation request has been received.
Vehicle: {!Evaluation_Booking__c.Vehicle_Name__c}
Date Range: {!Evaluation_Booking__c.Start_Date__c} to {!Evaluation_Booking__c.End_Date__c}
Please expect to hear back from your Nissan Fleet Representative.
Sincerly,
The Nissan Fleet Team
